Package XXLChess

Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
XXLChess.SoundPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class SoundPlayer extends Object implements Runnable
A class that plays sound clips in a separate thread.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundPlayer

      public SoundPlayer(Clip soundClip, Clip backupClip)
      Constructs a SoundPlayer object with the specified sound clips.
      Parameters:
      soundClip - the main sound clip to be played
      backupClip - the backup sound clip to be played if the main clip is already running

  • Method Details
